meanings.definition: (Historical) An ancient island, now known as Levanzo, one of the Aegadian Islands off the coast of Sicily, Italy.
meanings.english_definition: An ancient island, now known as Levanzo, one of the Aegadian Islands off the coast of Sicily, Italy.

examples.sentence: Ergusia was inhabited since the Paleolithic era.
examples.translation: エルグシアは旧石器時代から人が住んでいた。
